actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original resolution expressing the gratitude of the United States Senate for the service of Hugh C. Evans, Deputy Legislative Counsel of the United States Senate, and commending the said Hugh C. Evans for the superlative quality of his service.

summary.text: Expresses the gratitude of the Senate to Hugh C. Evans for his 36 years of faithful and exemplary service as a counsel in the Office of the Legislative Counsel (including more than 11 years as Deputy Legislative Counsel).

titles.title: An original resolution expressing the gratitude of the United States Senate for the service of Hugh C. Evans, Deputy Legislative Counsel of the United States Senate, and commending the said Hugh C. Evans for the superlative quality of his service.
